column5: Would any of you happen to know what spark plug an 80's Johnson 2hp outboard would use? Or a site i could possibly find out?
This might be a dumb question but... do you have the old one? you can check the code on the side..
apparently it's the wrong one, but the guy didn't say what the right one is
For my 1980 Johnson 2 HP it's Champion J6J.  Spark plug gap is 0.030"
